original_text: You are to eat it in your own towns. Both the ceremonially unclean and the clean may eat it, as if it were gazelle or deer.
korean_text: 네 성중에서 먹되 부정한 자나 정한 자가 다 같이 먹기를 노루와 사슴을 먹음 같이 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: You are to eat it in your own towns.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 자기 성읍에서 그것을 먹어야 한다.

sentences.original_text: Both the ceremonially unclean and the clean may eat it,
sentences.korean_translation: 부정한 자와 정한 자가 다 그것을 먹을 수 있으며,

sentences.original_text: as if it were gazelle or deer.
